function.config: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT (str(?label_lang) AS ?label) ?mov WHERE { ?mov rdf:type dbpedia:Film. ?mov dbpedia:director ?dir. ?dir rdfs:label ?label_lang. # BIND(str(?label_lang) AS ?labsel). } #ORDER BY ?mov ?dir LIMIT 1000
